s0400.literal: Appraisal says: Emperor Xuan's governance—trustworthy rewards and certain punishments, comprehensive examination of names and realities; political affairs, literature, and legal scholars all perfected their abilities, even to the point that skilled craftsmen and artisans' instruments, from the Yuan to Cheng periods, few could match them; this is also sufficient to know that officials fulfilled their duties and the people were at peace in their occupations.
s0400.idiomatic: Appraisal: Emperor Xuan's governance featured trustworthy rewards and certain punishments, with comprehensive examination of names and realities. Political affairs, literary, and legal scholars all perfected their abilities—even skilled craftsmen and artisans' instruments were unmatched from the Yuan to Cheng periods. This shows officials fulfilled their duties and people were at peace in their occupations.

s0401.literal: He encountered the Xiongnu in disorder, pushed away the perishing and secured the surviving, established trustworthy authority over the northern barbarians; the Chanyu admired righteousness, bowed his head and claimed vassal status.
s0401.idiomatic: He encountered the Xiongnu in disorder, pushed away the perishing and secured the surviving, establishing trustworthy authority over the northern barbarians. The Chanyu admired righteousness, bowed his head and became a vassal.

s0402.literal: His merit illuminates the ancestors, his achievements extend to descendants; it can be called a restoration, matching the virtue of the Yin ancestor and Zhou Xuan.
s0402.idiomatic: His merit illuminates the ancestors and his achievements extend to descendants. It can be called a restoration, matching the virtue of the Yin ancestor Tang and Zhou King Xuan.
